channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kamala Harris Finally Puts Some 'Policies' on Her Website, and Hoo Boy, Are They Bad
Harris solidifies support with Black voters, Trump numbers hold steady: poll
item.description: More Black Americans say they are planning to head to the polls on Election Day now that Vice President Kamala Harris is running, a new poll says.

item.title: Huckabee to Newsmax: Trump Debate 'Magic' Lies in Unpredictability
item.description: Former President Donald Trump's "magic" in debates lies in his unpredictability, former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee told Newsmax on Monday.

item.title: Parody Song With Jim Morrison and The Doors' 'Light My Fire' Footage Torches Kamala Harris
Gaetz questions Jack Smith's authority to keep up Trump probes after judge calls him 'unlawfully appointed'
item.description: Rep. Matt Gaetz is writing to Attorney General Merrick Garland, questioning the legitimacy of special counsel Jack Smith's most recent legal moves.

item.title: Trump Posts About Virgin Mary and the Left Loses Their Minds
Harris finally adds policy page to campaign website, devotes several sections to Trump
item.description: Democratic presidential nominee Vice President Harris added policy proposals to her campaign website 50 days after President Biden exited the race.
